ca.ualberta.cs.unter.model.request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.unter.model.request.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptedRequest, CompletedRequest, ConfirmedRequest, NormalRequest, PendingRequest

    public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that contains all attributes a Request should have.
